name: walkover
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
informal (US also walkaway) a game or sports event that is won very easily by one side or one person: The semifinal should be a walkover for France.
the act of winning one stage of a competition without having to compete in it because the person that you should be playing against is no longer taking part
